title: "Native American Student Council Calls for GU Land Acknowledgement, Indigenous Peoples Day Recognition"
excerpt: "The Native American Student Council (NASC) called on Georgetown University to issue a land acknowledgment and officially recognize Indigenous Peoples Day. On Oct. 11, NASC — a student group that advocates for Indigenous community members on campus — hosted an event in Red Square featuring three speakers from the organization."
